      • sendRequest

        public static java.lang.String sendRequest​(java.lang.String URL,
                                           FormParameters params)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a request to the website (to gather all NOTAM identifiers to be manipulated or to lookup for a single iedntifier's data)
        Parameters:
        URL - the URL the request must be sent to
        params - are the parameters of the search ( FormParameters )
        Returns:
        the HTLM response of the site as a String
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the request can't be sent (non existent URL...)

      • findIdentifiers

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findIdentifiers​(java.lang.String HTMLMessage)
        Parses the HTML file received to find all NOTAM identifiers
        Parameters:
        HTMLMessage - is the message received from the site
        Returns:
        the list of identifiers as an ArrayList

      • IdentifierExists

        public static boolean IdentifierExists​(java.lang.String HTMLMessage)
        Verifies that the received HTML page corresponds to an existing NOTAM identifier's reponse
        Parameters:
        HTMLMessage - the HTML page received from the site
        Returns:
        If the page corresponds to an existing NOTAM identifier

      • findField

        public static java.lang.String findField​(java.lang.String HTMLMessage,
                                         java.lang.String field)
        Find a specific field on a received HTML page
        Parameters:
        HTMLMessage - the message received from the site
        field - the field to search (for instance, "Q", "A", "B"...)
        Returns:
        the field that was searched, on a single line
